name: eslint-plugin-meteor
author: Dominik Ferber <dominik.ferber+npm@gmail.com>
description: Meteor specific linting rules for ESLint

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.unit-test: istanbul cover --dir reports/coverage node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/**/*.js -- --reporter dot
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
